roleset.name: make an educated guess
roleset.note: HYPOTHESIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hypothesize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from hypothesize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: It might be alleged that TV has done more than its share to popularize and promote non-violent civil disobedience, so [the second situation]-1 hypothesized *trace*-1 above would be simply a case of ``chickens coming home to roost.''

example.name: active
example.text: John hypothesized that Mary was secretly lusting after him.
example.arg: that Mary was secretly lusting after him

roleset.name: theoretical, suppositional
roleset.note: HYPOTHETICAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. Closely related to 'hypothesize.01'. (from hypothetical.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: A couple weeks before or after thanksgiving , but most likely second week of december . Nothing in stone ... and *PRO* just hypothetical at present time
